name: INFINIDLE
description:
Note:  May take a little bit to load. 

DEVLOG: 

A 5-letter word guessing game inspired by Wordle, where each answer leads to another answer.

Guess the 5 letter word! After getting it correct, you will be granted more guesses (depending on how many you used for the previous word), and you must guess another word. Over time, less and less guesses will be rewarded, and the game will become harder.

Try and get the best score possible!

If I get enough demand, I will make an update - maybe share function, unlimited mode, general improvements etc
